features.description: Project setup and initialization with git repository
Create init.sh script for development environment setup
Create project_context.md documenting strategy and approach
Create ideas.md for brainstorming and idea generation (target 100+ ideas)
Research and document Apple.com design patterns and animations
Analyze existing gemini-ad repository pages for reference
Create shared CSS framework with Apple.com-inspired design system
Create shared JavaScript utilities for animations and interactions
Design Valentine's Day infographics and love letter hook landing page
Create Writers segment landing page with VO3 and content creation tools
Create Creators segment landing page with Nano Banana and creative tools
Create Operators segment landing page with workspace integration features
Create Automators segment landing page with automation workflows
Create Apple.com-style minimalist landing page with bundling concept
Create trust-focused landing page emphasizing citations and fact-checking
Create Google Workspace integration landing page with sliding panel showcase
Create research-focused landing page for academic and professional users
Create productivity landing page with time-saving features and workflows
Create aspirational/premium landing page with high-end visuals
Implement highlight panel with sliding interface for use case demonstrations
Create short-form video animations (Apple.com style) for key features
Implement dynamic graphical elements and animations across all pages
Set up Playwright for automated screenshot testing
Create testing framework to validate design and layout quality
Generate screenshots of all 10+ landing pages for review
Create reflections-and-best.md for iterative design analysis
Evaluate all generated landing pages and select top 10
Optimize CTAs across all landing pages for maximum conversion
Ensure mobile responsiveness for all landing pages
Implement hero text optimization for short attention spans
Add smooth scroll animations and parallax effects
Create comparison landing page (Gemini vs competitors)
Implement lazy loading for images and animations
Add accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
Create GitHub Pages deployment configuration
Document all design decisions and rationale
Create index/hub page linking to all 10 final landing pages
Performance optimization (minification, compression)
Cross-browser testing (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
Final quality assurance and design polish
